SELECT sum(tt.num) as num ,count(tt.*) as cityNum from (
SELECT sum(oo.num) as num, oo.city from ( SELECT o.num,o.city from inn_customer o LEFT JOIN bang_inn b ON b.inn_id = o.inn_id LEFT JOIN user_info u ON u.id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN inn_label lab ON lab.id = b.inn_label_id where 1=1 and o.create_date BETWEEN '${startDate}' AND '${endDate}'
and b.user_id = '${userId}'
and b.company_id='${companyId}'
AND b.inn_label_id ='${tagId}'
) oo GROUP BY oo.city ) tt
